title: Glass Menagerie- references to time and place

content.question: In the second and third paragraphs, the specific references to time (“the thirties”) and place (“Spain,” “Chicago, Cleveland, Saint Louis”) primarily serve to

choices.label: reinforce the notion that the play is part of a “world of reality” (paragraph 5) that will be reconstructed from “memory” (paragraph 4)
support the notion that the play is firmly a “sentimental” play and not a “realistic” play (paragraph 4)
show that Tom is a “poet” (paragraph 5) who is mainly interested in social and political subjects
reveal that Tom is a nostalgic narrator who wishes he could live in the past

content.answer: reinforce the notion that the play is part of a “world of reality” (paragraph 5) that will be reconstructed from “memory” (paragraph 4)

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Identify and describe specific textual details that convey or reveal a setting.
